name: eriodictyol,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase
definition: Eriodictyol + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> Pentahydroxyflavanone + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
comment: flavonoid 3',5'-hydroxylase flavonoid 3',5'-monooxygenase second step of two-step reaction (see R02443, R02442+R04902)
